hero.headline: Build Better Products, Faster
hero.subcopy: The all-in-one platform that helps teams ship high-quality software with confidence. From ideation to deployment, we've got you covered.

features.title: Real-time Collaboration
features.description: Work together seamlessly with your team. See changes instantly and stay in sync across all projects.

features.title: Advanced Analytics
features.description: Get deep insights into your product performance with our comprehensive analytics dashboard.

features.title: Secure Infrastructure
features.description: Enterprise-grade security with SOC 2 compliance, end-to-end encryption, and automated backups.

features.title: API Integrations
features.description: Connect with 100+ tools and services. Our robust API makes custom integrations a breeze.

features.title: Automated Workflows
features.description: Streamline your processes with intelligent automation. Save time and reduce manual errors.

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Our dedicated support team is always ready to help you succeed, no matter the time zone.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: This platform has transformed how our team works. We've reduced our deployment time by 60% and shipping features has never been easier.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.content: The analytics and insights provided are invaluable. We've made data-driven decisions that boosted our conversion rates significantly.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.content: Best developer experience I've had in years. The API is well-documented, integrations are smooth, and the support team is incredibly responsive.

pricing.name: Starter
pricing.description: Perfect for individuals and small projects.

pricing.name: Pro
pricing.description: For growing teams that need more power.

pricing.name: Enterprise
pricing.description: For large organizations with specific needs.

faq.question: Can I change my plan later?
faq.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate your billing accordingly.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for Enterprise customers.

faq.question: Is there a free trial?
faq.answer: Yes! All paid plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

faq.question: Do you offer refunds?
faq.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with our service, contact our support team for a full refund.

faq.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faq.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your access will continue until the end of your billing period.

pricingSection.headline: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricingSection.subcopy: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. All plans include a 14-day free trial.
pricingSection.footer: All prices are in USD. Cancel anytime.

newsletter.headline: Stay Updated
newsletter.subcopy: Get the latest news, updates, and tips delivered straight to your inbox.

company.name: ModernLanding
company.description: Building the future of product development tools.
